# The `ForwardTemplateReference` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A forward-reference to a template argument that was not known at the point where the template parameter name was parsed in a mangling. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A forward-reference to a template argument that was not known at the point where the template parameter name was parsed in a mangling.

This is created when demangling the name of a specialization of a conversion function template:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">operator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&#42;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


When demangling a specialization of the conversion function template, we encounter the name of the template (including the <code>T</code>) before we reach the template argument list, so we cannot substitute the parameter name for the corresponding argument while parsing. Instead, we create a <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/forwardtemplatereference">ForwardTemplateReference</a></code> node that is resolved after we parse the template arguments.

Definition at line 1563 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h">ItaniumDemangle.h</a>.
